channel.title: Can I make a buy X or buy 100? [317]
channel.description: Hello, currently players can only buy (for example) 10 runes at a time, my 317 delta source does not have a buy X or a buy 100, is there some way I can add this?

item.title: Can I make a buy X or buy 100? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Ceres Ceres
item.description:
@Ceres wrote:

Yes, I do believe this requires some client editing as well and not just server side. There is a tutorial on how to add the buy X and sell X feature. If you canâ€™t find one try and use Google Search.
